ABOUT.TITLE: Who I Am
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I'm a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Magdeburg. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
ABOUT.LOCATION: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Magdeburg and remotely.
ABOUT.MINDSET: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
ABOUT.APPROACH: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

SKILLS.TITLE: Technologies
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, which has taught me invaluable lessons about problem-solving concepts. Through GR understanding new technologies and methodologies to Continuously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
SKILLS.CONTACT: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Portfolio
PROJECTS.SUBTITLE: Featured Projects
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

POLLO.TITLE: El Pollo Loco
POLLO.DESCRIPTION: Jump and run game based on object-oriented programming.

BUBBLE.TITLE: DA Bubble
BUBBLE.DESCRIPTION: Angular-based chat application with real-time messaging.

FEEDBACK.TITLE: What my colleagues say about me

TESTIMONIAL1.TEXT: Marzieh is a really pleasant and friendly team member. She’s easy to talk to and always open to discussing any problems in a constructive way. Whether it’s work-related or just a quick chat, she creates a positive atmosphere and makes teamwork smooth and enjoyable.

TESTIMONIAL2.TEXT: Marzi not only brings technical expertise but also a great deal of team spirit. Her efficient approach has often helped us find good solutions quickly.

TESTIMONIAL3.TEXT: Working with Marzi was a wonderful experience! She is incredibly hardworking, eager to learn, and always motivated to develop herself further. Her open and easygoing nature makes collaboration especially pleasant, and her strong communication skills have always ensured a smooth exchange.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact me
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Let's work together
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.

FORM.NAME: What's your name?
FORM.NAME_ERROR: Oops! it seems your name is missing
FORM.EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address
FORM.MESSAGE_PLACEHOLDER: Hello Marzi, I am interested in...
FORM.MESSAGE_ERROR: Please tell me about your project
FORM.PRIVACY_THIRD: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Success!
SUCCESS.MESSAGE: Your message has been sent successfully.

DATA_COLLECTION.TITLE: Data Collection
DATA_COLLECTION.TEXT: This website collects personal information only through the contact form. The information you provide (name, email) is used solely for responding to your inquiries.

COOKIES.TITLE: Cookies & Analytics
COOKIES.TEXT: This website uses essential cookies necessary for its basic functionality. No third-party tracking cookies are used.

RIGHTS.TITLE: Your Rights
RIGHTS.TEXT: You have the right to request information about your stored data, its origin, recipients, and the purpose of its collection at no charge. You also have the right to request that it be corrected, blocked, or deleted.
